model.description: The video generation model to use (allowed values: sora-2, sora-2-pro). Defaults to `sora-2`.

prompt.description: Text prompt that describes the video to generate.

input_reference.description: Optional image reference that guides generation.

seconds.description: Clip duration in seconds (allowed values: 4, 8, 12). Defaults to 4 seconds.

size.description: Output resolution formatted as width x height (allowed values: 720x1280, 1280x720, 1024x1792, 1792x1024). Defaults to 720x1280.

title: Create video request
description: Parameters for creating a new video generation job.
